org.kepler.reporting.rio

Class ItemProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.reporting.rio.ItemProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ItemProperties
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is intended as a very general holder for Item properties. The intent is that subclassess will provide pertinent property key (static constant Strings) that are relevant to the particular Item type. This is in lieu of having an ever-growing number of methods for getting/setting item properties.
    Author:
    leinfelder
    See Also:
    DynamicReportItem.DynamicItemProperties, Serialized Form
